PvE: Hard/quick + spikes + field/clown + Demo/ALH
Spike grenades benefit from reduced blast radius as that shifts more damage to impact damage. Velocity barrels are acceptable, but avoid Confined Launch and Volatile Launch if using spike grenades.

PvP: Confined/Volatile/(Linear/Quick) + Proxi + Qd/Threat Detector + Disruption Break
Inverse of Spikes, we want increased blast radius when using Proximity Grenades - but not at the cost of other stats.

PvE: Any + Tac/Appended + Overflow/Outlaw/Surplus + OfA/MKC/Rampage/(Frenzy?)/Thresh
Surplus + Frenzy combo buff handling, reload, stability (10/20/50) and damage, handing, reload respectively (20% buff, 30 stat points. This means you can get up to 80 stat points to handling and reload and 50 to stability.
Overflow and MKC have very poor synergy with each other, with MKC unable to be procced while overflow is active. While these are both excellent perks, the combo is not worth keeping

PvE: Any + Liquid Coils + Clown Cartridge/Rapid hit/ALH/Field Prep + Demo/Vorpal/Frenzy
Frenzy and Vorpal now give the same damage bonus (15%), so it’s your choice which perk. Vorpal affects majors [champs] and bosses, Frenzy affects all enemies and gives a +50 stat bonus to reload speed.

PvP: Fluted + accurized + Killing Wind/Quickdraw/Firmly Planted + Headseeker/Kill Clip/Moving Target
Pulses do appear to be range capped, so like Cold Denial, it’s best to focus on stability if you get Killing Wind since KW adds +20 range, + 50 mobility, and +~40  handling. This pulse has standard zoom and iron sights like those on Redrix.

PvE: Any + Alloy Mag + Surplus + Polymer Grip

PvP: Hammer Forged + Alloy Mag + Rangefinder/Killing Wind/Opening Shot/Eye of the Storm + Polymer Grip/ Combat Grip
Opening Shot is arguably the best in slot perk. Rangefinder is generally the go to (it does add ~3M of base range) but Hawkmoon is a run and gun weapon (in my opinion) - if you want range, run a 120 or Luna Faction boots =) Opening Shot gives serious bonus to accuracy on ground and in air and helps guarantee landing the first crit (or 7 stack OHKO if you wait for perk to reset). Moving Target is nearly worthless due to high base AA stat.

Opening Shot is arguably the best in slot perk. Rangefinder is generally the go to (it does add ~3M of base range) but Hawkmoon is a run and gun weapon (in my opinion) - if you want range, run a 120 or Luna Faction boots =) Opening Shot gives serious bonus to accuracy on ground and in air and helps guarantee landing the first crit (or 7 stack OHKO if you wait for perk to reset). Moving Target is nearly worthless due to high base AA stat.

PvP: X + Rico/HiCal + Slideshot/Rangefinder + Opening Shot/Vorpal/KC
Of the 140 HCs, Waking has lower base range at 38 therefore it cannot really be a max range weapon, however, it does have great base handing.
Due to the inability to fight at the extended ranges of 140s, sight choice can come down to which is preferred visually. Despite this, the sights which are normally ignored because of the stat penalties they incur (Sureshot & Crossfire) can be worth it to push the range out as far as possible.
Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh

60 base reload + 10 from mag perk + 10/20/40 form vorpal would be sufficient for reloads. Outlaw would max out reload (+60) but its not as consistently proc’d in higher level content.

Kickstart is a nice perk to reduce the charge time slightly, but has a very small period to proc it (needs charging during slide to ensure that you don’t lose the perk half way through the burst), and requires you to play a certain way to best use the perk (sprinting with a fusion out in order to get the perk to proc, leaving you vulnerable to a shotgun push or ranged primary fire)

PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip

PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip

PvP: any barrel except full bore and extended + Accurized + Snapshot/Firmly Planted + Moving Target/Opening Shot
PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Liquid Coils + Auto Loading Holster/Threat Detector + HIR/Rampage/KC

PvP: Red Dot 2/Red Dot Micro + Projection Fuse/Particle Repeater + Firmly Planted/Under Pressure + HIR/Rangefinder
This is a PvP Fusion through and through, and with the changes to fusions in S15 it’s potentially one of the best. As it’s currently only available from Xur, a god roll of this will be like Gold Dust until it sells one for us all. Keep an eye out for a Firmly Planted/Rangefinder roll with either of the zoom increasing scopes, but Under Pressure is still an excellent perk, with HIR not changing the bolts to kill (confirm?) but offering better damage per bolt, easier cleanup and excellent synergy with Under Pressure
